Desc.eng: So, how about the two-legged vermin, Van Helsing? Did you defeat the rat-people in the tunnels?
I think they won't try to attack again any time soon.
We have just lost an important outpost in the tunnels.
Good work. I suppose the General will also think twice next time about making a pact with monsters.
It is most unfortunate, Van Helsing. We must prepare for a next attack.
